text: Anodendron rhinosporum is a species of plant in the family Apocynaceae. It is endemic to Sri Lanka. ==Sources== * World Conservation Monitoring Centre 1998. Anodendron rhinosporum. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. Downloaded on 20 August 2007. Category:Flora of Sri Lanka rhinosporum Category:Critically endangered plants Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Anodendron rhinosporum
